title: What is PRINCE2®?
description: PRINCE2 is a process-based method for effective project management, and this qualification will equip you with the fundamental skills needed to be a successful project manager

title: What is PRINCE2 Agile®?
description: PRINCE2 Agile combines the flexibility and responsiveness of agile with the clearly-defined framework of PRINCE2, and has been created for individuals and organisations who already use the PRINCE2 methodology to manage their projects.
